website_summaries.verdict: This tote is handy for casual items and basic, everyday use, but it has limited practicality and some durability concerns.
pros: Ideal for carrying gym and sports gear because it's roomy (23- inches by 15- inches), lightweight, and crafted with sturdy nylon that resists moisture
Multiple pockets include 2 mesh exterior for separating wet and dry items
cons: Items tend to flop around inside the bag, as it lacks structure
Zippers occasionally stick, and the interior lining is prone to tears

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really really nice gym bag. Opens big. Spacious and roomy. Two drink bottles pockets outside perfect for 40oz water tumbler and 30oz coffee tumbler. Pockets on the inside as well. I wanted to get away from riffling through the duffel style gym bag and go to a more open tote style. This is it! Hope it last long!
customer_reviews.author: Tiwana 💞

customer_reviews.title: A stylish, practical and versitile bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag because I needed a bag that I could use while traveling and also to use for going to my fitness center. I used my bag for an 11 day vacation and loved it. It fit nicely under the seat and also doubled as a gym bag and beach tote. The two outside pockets work well for water bottles or hair products and the zippered pocket works for keys, etc. The two zippered inside pockets are handy and the inside is roomy enough for my swim gear, 2 towels, and shower bag. It is very stylish, roomy and organized bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I searched for gym bags for a few days before I decided on this one. I prefer the look of a tote over a duffle bag. I wasn't sure what to expect but I like it! It fits all my stuff for the gym including my gym shoes and shower flip flops. There are plenty of pockets for my things. The side mesh pockets will fit my 24 ounce water bottle. I do wish there was a back outside pocket, but its not a huge deal. I am overall happy with this bag. The zippers are cheap. Just need to be extra careful with them and not pull too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: I like the pockets to hold the smaller items and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag to use for the gym. I swim, so I needed something that would accommodate wet items. This bag is plenty large enough to hold my swim caps, goggles, a large beach towel, a smaller bath towel and flip flops with room to spare. I also put my wallet, keys and cell phone in the bag. I like the pockets to hold the smaller items and the outer pockets are nice for items I don't want to get wet. The bag is so nice, I also plan to use it as a tote for the beach. Plenty of pockets for holding different items and tons of room!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Front pocket broke the first day of use
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty bag, but not a very good material. The front pocket broke the first day i used it. The material looked like it was sliced open, and it didn't even had anything in it. I got to the gym and when i was going put my hand inside the pocket, one of my fingers went out... Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Indhira Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Even Better Than I hoped for...
customer_reviews.text: Even better than pictured. Super quality construction, lightweight and yet very sturdy. Smart placement of pockets, inside and out. The shoulder pad on the strap is comfy. I bought this to use as a carry on for flights. It is definitely classy looking, and strong enough to carry all I need. Zippers function smoothly. Material inside and out can be wiped clean, contrasting bright colored liner was a must for me--you can easily visualize the contents vs black liners.
customer_reviews.author: D.MarieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad but Not As Good As Expected
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bag to carry my stuff to the Rec Center for both walking on the track and swimming. The mesh pocket inside has already torn apart and no longer holds items separately from the rest of the contents of the bag. It's really a bit small for what I needed, but usable. It's appearance is nice, zippers all work well and straps are great for carrying by hand or over the shoulder. I'm just disappointed in the quality of materials used for inside pockets. I have the product about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Ross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on the Run!
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers have stated, this bag is roomy with plenty of pockets. At first glance I didn't think it would hold much. I'm a tall woman who wears a larger shoe. I can fit my running shoes, running clothes (hat, hydration belt, pants and shirt), a spare change of clothes, a small cosmetic bag, and a small toiletriy bag inside. I'm amazed at it's lightweight durability and how much this bag can hold!! I've used it severa times and haven't seen any weaknesses or tearing in the stitching. I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommed this bag
customer_reviews.text: this bag is well made with lots of pockets and details. I like the "tote bag" shape of it because it makes it a little dressier than a normal gym bag. I tis light weight with a comfortable shoulder strap. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room and seems to be a quality bag
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what they mean by "rommy" pockets. I think someone meant "roomy". We bought this as a pool bag and I love it. There's a zipper pocket outside and another netted zipper one inside, plus two open pockets and another large separate section. I've had it a couple of months and I'm happy with the quality. We cab fit two beach towels plus iPads, phones, speakers, coozies, etc. in with no problems. I would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: DaxxydogTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Purchased in 2017 - still looks and works very good
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to bag - groceries (REALLY load it up!) mainly but also for the gym. Holds a lot. Cleans up well if there is a spill. I was looking at tennis bags (need room for tennis, pickle and pop racquets as I never know which one I will end up playing) so thinking I should just buy this bag again.
customer_reviews.author: frivolous_lux

customer_reviews.title: Chic gym bag but....
customer_reviews.text: The size and appearance is what I expected and it's very lightweight. I do not use it as a gym bag, rather as an airline carry-on bag and as a tote bag around town. My only problem is that it's very"flabby." I would much prefer the bag to have two or three sturdy dividers, the length of the bag, inside to help me separate the contents.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: It fits easily in a gym locker and has sturdy handles and ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag was all it was advertised to be - waterproof, lots of interior pockets, outside pockets for drinks or a traveling coffee mug. It fits easily in a gym locker and has sturdy handles and a shoulder strap. I have been using it since purchasing several weeks ago it as it is easy to locate various items taken to the gym because of the compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Forget the gym; this is a great tote for everyday.
customer_reviews.text: I know it's a gym bag, but I use it as an everyday tote bag. It's big for my 4'9" body, but I love the two outside pockets (sunglasses and water bottle), the outside zippered space for bus and membership passes and keys, and the giant interior that holds everything I schlep with me daily. And the price can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Soloway

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very light (a big deal for me
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, very light (a big deal for me!), and lots of space! I was hoping the interior would have more structure or different designed pockets so sides don't fall to the center.
customer_reviews.author: ReisterMeister

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gym Gag
customer_reviews.text: If you're on the fence about buying this gym bag, don't be, it's awesome! Besides not looking like your typical gym bag, it's extremely roomy and has lots of pockets inside and out. I particularly like the mesh pockets on the outside for your water bottles or energy drinks. This bag could also be used as an overnight bag. If you want to use the shoulder strap, you'll find it in one of the large pockets....
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Better than any diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: After trying multiple diaper bags that all weighed too much, or were too small, or didn't have the right pockets, I started shopping in adjacent categories like beach bags and yoga bags and found this one. It's perfect! It weighs almost nothing, holds a lot, is weather resistant, and hangs nicely from the stroller. We liked it so much we bought a second for ourselves and a third as a gift for another new parent couple.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great tote
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tote to carry to work for my lunch, shoes, and purse. It seems very durable. It has many roomy pockets. The handles are sturdy and includes a padded strap. I have had several compliments.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy this bag
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this bag. It is roomy enough for everything I need to take to the gym, including shower gear and work clothes for after. The inside and outside pockets help me keep everything organized so I don't have to waste time fishing around for little things that used to fall to the bottom of the last gym bag. I'l also enjoying the quality of the bag. It is very well crafted and well made. I shopped for quite a while looking for a bag for the gym and I'm very glad I ended up getting this one.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is lightweight but sturdy. It easily fits my workout clothes, my size 11 sneakers, my water bottle and my container of amino powder. And there's room to spare. The separate pockets on the inside are nice for smaller items like hair ties and headbands. I would recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: PH44

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This bag was exactly what I needed for the gym! It has enough pockets and segments for me to organize all my stuff and the fabric is thin but durable. I love how I can zip it up so that people don't see what's in there either. Been using it for a month now and it's working fine. My favorite bag so far!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag, it is nice and big. It fits my gym clothes, sneakers and boxing gloves. Like the material as well. My only concern is the handles look like the might be coming loose from the bag. I bought this in December and I only carry from house to car and car to gym. It doesn’t get a lot of wear and tear. We will see how long it lasts
customer_reviews.author: Gina P. Balsamo

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, perfect size, lots of pockets. :)
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that zipped and was water resistant for a trip to the beach and this bag is perfect. It has lots of pockets, so easy to keep things organized. Good size for towels and other beach supplies. Perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.author: LindsvanleerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag for gym and/or overnights. It appears to be made well, it's attractive, and a great size (I fit large towel, bathing suit, gym outfit, sneakers, and still had room for other items). Worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and roomy without being too big
customer_reviews.text: Nice and roomy without being too big. Can put gymshoes and flip flops on the bottom and still have room for two changes of clothes without over stuffing. Plenty of pockets inside. Looks like the pictures online. Great value and function.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It’s roomy and has great pocket placement. I use this as my daily work bag. I can fit my lunch, gym clothes, personal items and many other things with room to spare. For those of you who say you didn’t get a shoulder strap: LOOK in the front pocket. 🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect workout bag - just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect workout bag - just what I was looking for! Now, if I could just make it to the gym...
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Take it anywhere if don’t want to bring your expensive luggage (like a hospital stay).
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag years ago and just realized a review was pending. Originally purchased for the gym, but I’ve used it for weekend trips and a hospital stay. I like the inside pockets for shoes so nothing else gets ruined. It’s very lightweight and packs up easy.
customer_reviews.author: Blusie

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, not too big or too small
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, not too big or too small, divider pockets in side and nice big zip pocket inside and one on front Nice bottle holders on sides , good for gym bag Only complaint is the lining gets caught in zipper lot
customer_reviews.author: mindi sue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Gym Rats!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Love! Perfect size! Stylish! The only thing that would be nice is some sort of divider for shoes, but I can't take a star away for the lack thereof. Oh, and an outside pocket with a magnetic snap (instead of a zipper) would be very convenient, but I really cannot complain. One of my favorite Amazon purchases, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Savage Strong

customer_reviews.title: light and lots of room
customer_reviews.text: This is my perfect yoga bag. I carry blocks and other props, plus some personal items and there would be room for more! It is also very light, even with the items mentioned above. I am very pleased with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: gnadas

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag.
customer_reviews.text: I was very please when I received my bag. It is just what I was looking for. There is plenty of room to hold several sets of my work out clothes. The extra pockets make it nice to hold my headphones, towel, water bottle and other items for easy access. The material is study and I am confident it will hold up well for many uses.
customer_reviews.author: Therese Depcinski

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of Pockets-Yippee!
customer_reviews.text: I love all the pockets, it's roomy and holds all my gear. I'm a happy camper with this well designed & made gym bag. Oh YOU gotta love the pink trim too!
customer_reviews.author: Sammie G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it - Cute, lightweight, sturdy, several pockets
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that I wish they made a sightly bigger version. This will hold gym clothes or 1-2 outfits, but is too small for a long weekend away.
customer_reviews.author: JMel

customer_reviews.title: Great tote bag!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this bag is awesome!!! I love my bag. Its a very large bag, which is perfect because I can carry lots of stuff since I work night shift and the reason why I brought this great tote bag. I can't complain, it has a lot of spaces for everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: Anabell

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect in size, style and weight. I can fill it up or have it pretty much empty and it retains its shape. Zippers are smooth an the extranpicjetscare a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Perez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift. The person who received it loves it and uses it daily.
customer_reviews.author: LESLEY M.

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable gym bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag when I go to water aerobicsi like that it has separate compartments for my shower products and wet bathing suit. I use the 2 outside pockets to whole my water bottles. I probably will use it as a carrryon when I travel too!
customer_reviews.author: rita berg

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bag is way over priced. Perhaps $15 tops. Just ok. Serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: HappyAtHome

customer_reviews.title: This bag is a great and very useful size and the straps are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a great and very useful size and the straps are comfortable. It is a good quality for the price. I am using it for school, but feel that it would be better for the gym and items that are not very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sheets

customer_reviews.title: BEST gym bag I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: BEST gym bag I have ever bought! The amount of stuff I can get into it....I look like Mary Poppins!!! Need a lamp? Don’t have a lamp but I have my headlight to wear running! Need headphones....I have three pairs in here what do you prefer? Winter boots? Not a problem. Running sneakers...absolutely! Love this bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: this bag is amazing, i love it!! it's big like a tote purse bag but fits everything I need in a gym bag. Even better it's my favorite color, pink and black! I would recommend, it's light and fits a good about of things. Trust me, I'm a girl the carries several bags inside of one bag.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke after a month and a half.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag in December. I like the bag but today the part that attaches strap to the bag broke. It is cheap plastic. Now I am forced to find a replacement because the cross-body strap is a must for downtown Baltimore.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny F.

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room but plastic shoulder strap holder ring and zipper broke after a few weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Ant Farm

customer_reviews.title: Love the gym size
customer_reviews.text: I love how big this bag is and it has lots of pockets to keep everything organized.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great, cute gym bag!
customer_reviews.text: Roomy and cute bag for the gym, I really like the wide opening top and lots of pockets. I wish the straps were slightly longer, it’s a little snug to put on my shoulder when bag is full, otherwise it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Laura J

customer_reviews.title: It’s very floppy, doesn’t stand well.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and all the pockets but I am not a fan of how flimsy it is. It’s not a sturdy standing bag, it’s very floppy but seems to be made pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: christa

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag fits a lot of items. Affordable yet great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The bag is exactly what I needed. It's roomy, functional and easily collapses for storage. The style is great for both summer and winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in less than 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: The bag started off great but after 2 months all the mesh tore. I am unable to use any of the pockets. I still used it until the large strap broke. One of the zippers sticks. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: SuperHidee

customer_reviews.title: This bag has a ton of room! I use ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag has a ton of room! I use it for the gym and have enough room for gym clothes, shoes, swim suit, towel, shower bag and change of clothes for after shower! I also use it as a overnight bag.
customer_reviews.author: KristinaU

customer_reviews.title: It's roomy, and I can fit most everything I ...
customer_reviews.text: It's roomy, and I can fit most everything I take with me to the gym in it, but it is a little hard to carry, especially around the shoulders. If the straps were longer or more robust/padded, it would make things easier.
customer_reviews.author: Suja Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gym bag
customer_reviews.text: This is lightweight, a good roomy size and appears to be well made. I use it to go to the gym and it holds everything I need with room to spare. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: - Got it in and loved the feel of the material
customer_reviews.text: - Got it in and loved the feel of the material. Love that it truely repels water. It was much bigger then i expected. But has a lot of pockets for organization of your stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Anne

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag! I purchased this bag for the pool ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag! I purchased this bag for the pool to carry not only pool things but hairdryer etc . Everything fit perfectly. If it lasts I will be very happy camper
customer_reviews.author: Dragonthunder

customer_reviews.title: Versitile
customer_reviews.text: Great gym bag. Like the space , side pocket & water bottle holder.
customer_reviews.author: CLO

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Poor quality. Not roomy. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as pics make it seem. Very low quality. Zippers are cheap, bag material is thin not durable. Not worth the price. Doesn't even offer free shipping returns. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I am able to fit everything in here!! There are two mesh pockets on the outside. My water bottle goes in one and my knee pad goes in the other. In the large Compartment I keep my boxing gloves, hand wraps, sneakers and workout clothes. There is a mesh pocket inside that I keep my gym towel in. When I'm in my gear my street clothes and jacket also fit in the bag and the bag fits into the small locker at the gym. This is the perfect gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Strong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, nice price! This bag was just what I needed .... it looks good and serves the purpose. No need for one of the major brand-name bags. This bag is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetiepie

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome! As a Mom of a toddler this bag is perfect. It's waterproof, has a shoulder strap, and plenty of pockets. I have used this as a bag for swim lessons & it will hold a couple towels, an outfit, diapers & wipes, etc. I've also used this bag as a beach bag and a bag to take boating. Excellent bag! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size, nice look!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! Great size, fits everything I need for the gym plus clothes. I love how it’s feminine and not a typical gym bag
customer_reviews.author: Leo Sousa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Very practical bag with lots of pockets including two on the outside where I can carry my water in one and phone in the other. Larger than I really need but it would be great for someone who needs to carry shoes, change of clothes etc. Very good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the gym.
customer_reviews.text: With the exception of a separate compartment for shoes which this does not have, it is perfect. I love the smaller size, that fits easily into the locker, yet big enough to easily carry my clothes and toiletries.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I do not usually write reviews but I just had to. This bag is great for holding my stuff for working out. It is spacious and has lots of pockets. Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Melisha Placide

customer_reviews.title: Great Gym + work bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great Gym + work bag! Its spacious and decent color which can be taken to work. I can fit almost everything in it.
customer_reviews.author: Shilpi

customer_reviews.title: Back to workout bag!
customer_reviews.text: Roomy large workout bag ... perfect for towel, earplugs, shower-shoes, and extras. Side and internal pockets are great.
customer_reviews.author: CarrieK

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, durable, water resistant  and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This gym bag is great, lots of pockets inside. Outside pockets for bottled water. Love this bag! Plenty of room to put your gym items. You will not disappointed with this bag! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mesh side pockets great for a water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Use this bag as a carryon for a trip. Mesh side pockets great for a water bottle. Very spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and just the right size. Not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Valley Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for my water aerobics class. Has plenty of pockets and room. Lightweight and water proof!
customer_reviews.author: D. MCDANIEL

customer_reviews.title: Good quality; excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Good size; flexible material; great for gym or couple of day trip.
customer_reviews.author: wendy behr

customer_reviews.title: The waterproof interior and netted pouches outside are great!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this bag for going to the gym!! The waterproof interior and netted pouches outside are great!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary I Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beach bag!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect beach bag! Big enough for all my kids needs and mine. A great addition for summer!
customer_reviews.author: AAP

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Zipper broke the first time i tried to zipper it.
customer_reviews.author: A Baylouny

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the gym or beach. Love the zippered pocket on front. I really like how lightweight the bag is also.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle T

customer_reviews.title: Super light and very spacious
customer_reviews.text: Super light and very spacious. Lots of pockets and I love not having to dig around a gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight bag for the gym. Came folded in a small package so no bottom or much structure which is fine when it is full. Love having the straps and the long detachable shoulder strap. It is large but gave it 4 stars as it could be a tad larger and another pocket across the bag would have been nice. But other than that, the best bag I could find for the gym at a good price and easy to carry. It remains lightweight when fully loaded. Love the outside pockets and used one side for my water bottle and other side for shower and personal care items for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa 1121

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag it's so strong and roomy it's the best purchase I ever made
customer_reviews.author: Shani L. Schoenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag to use as a beach bag and it is great. The material is lightweight and repels water. Lots of compartments to keep everything organized. Super roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product and love all the pockets.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag, I use it as a beach bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mtngirl

customer_reviews.title: No shoulder strap
customer_reviews.text: The bag looks great. Right size. But came without the shoulder strap which was one of the deciding factors for buying this particular bag.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Bought as gift
customer_reviews.text: Liked it most out of all her Christmas presents. Wasn't over the top big and fits on the shoulder without bumping your hip when you walk.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Redding

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and roomy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and roomy. Love the pockets for different stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry A. Hopson

customer_reviews.title: No structure totally flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I’m returning the bag. It’s way too light, flimsy has no structure so if it’s not too full tbe bottles on tbe side pockets will fall out
customer_reviews.author: Marilu Woods

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! Very sturdy and roomy. Better than what I expected-it's awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not what I really wanted but will try it on a trip.
customer_reviews.text: Bag is too big for carry-on & doesn’t have the pockets I wanted. Seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag - 2 water bottle outside pockets - tons of room inside
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! I have gotten a ton of compliments on this bag. Love love love love!!
customer_reviews.author: #1sportsfan

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Roomy and lightweight. No room to hold a yoga mat, but it holds everything else. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: LovetoRead

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Gym bag. Plenty of pockets to use for just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roomy bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gym bag . Makes organizing easy and holds everything . Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag, both for the gym and weekend trips. It is roomy, has a great shape and the material is lightweight, yet sturdy. A great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: sheilabeurket

customer_reviews.title: Made poorly, worse Amazon purchase ever.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for work/commuting bag. I've been using about a week. The inside mesh pocket is already ripped. It has no structure.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I was looking for. Lightweight ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Lightweight, multi-pocketed, shoulder and hand straps mesh water bottle pockets on the outside and it zips closed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I like mine just fine. Shoulder strap was in front pocket so you can attach or not. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing well made tote
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this bag has enough pockets and room to fit everything I need for work. Well made and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice bag a little small but big enough nice pockets
customer_reviews.author: Robin Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Attractive bag
customer_reviews.text: A lightweight and versatile bag that can function as an everyday bag from overnights to a super gym bag. I love the internal and external pockets and the optional shoulder strap.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Newcomb

customer_reviews.title: The customer service was great, they sent an email to check in on ...
customer_reviews.text: this bag is waterproof, has TONS of space, the bag itself is light and it makes carrying it over your shoulder a breeze. I bought the bag for the gym but because of the lightweight and size i've used it for both my work bag and workout. The customer service was great, they sent an email to check in on the product and my satisfaction overall....i'd order another bag or other items without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Nollen

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and shape!! I teach Spin and it holds everything!!! Great value for the cost!!
customer_reviews.author: Millie

product_meta.title: Gym Tote Bag for Women with Roomy Zipper Pockets
feature_bullets: ★ Gym tote bag with roomy main compartment can hold all your daily essentials.
★ Front 2 mesh pockets and one zippered pocket for additional storage.
★ INTENDED USE: GYM TOTE, YOGA TOTE, SHOPPING TOTE, TRAVEL TOTE, EVERYDAY CARRYING BAG and MORE.
★100% LIFETIME GUARANTEE: This tote bag comes with a 100% Money Back Lifetime Guarantee. You won't get this lifetime guarantee from the other brands on Amazon.
